instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Α1425 (820-3462) Runs slow.
threads.message:
Good evening guys.
A customer brought in this A1425 complaining about it running too slow.
Nothing unusual about the motherboard besides the common issue with the corrosion on the wifi module (which i still dont get how it gets there).
Booting from an external hdd with yosemite on it i get the attached readings. Any ideas? [ATTACH type="full" width="200px"]43272._xfImport[/ATTACH]

threads.title: Α1425 (820-3462) Runs slow.
threads.message: Run ASD 155 and report what errors you get

threads.title: Α1425 (820-3462) Runs slow.
threads.message: Hey again and sorry for the delay, this is the results i get.

threads.title: Α1425 (820-3462) Runs slow.
threads.message:
Got an update on this one, after reading some previous posts here, i decided to remove the battery and the trackpad.
Apparently he didnt think it was necessary to report that he had spilled coffee on the trackpad, i ordered a new trackpad cable just to check it because his was funny looking. 
Will report back results.

threads.title: Α1425 (820-3462) Runs slow.
threads.message:
When you run ASD, set "On error" option to "Continue".
Then repeat the test, just in case other error may appear.

threads.title: Α1425 (820-3462) Runs slow.
threads.message:
Ok, you can mark this as solved. Replaced the trackpad and the laptop works perfectly, no sensor issues, normal speed, everything works smoothly.
Thanks a lot for your replies.
